channel.title: apps on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in apps on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Apps on my Dock
item.description: 22:58 Monday 06 July 2015 JST Here’s a list of apps I have on my Dock, in case my computer comes back with its brain wiped: Finder Anki Firefox Chrome Emacs Sublimetext 2 Skype XCode Netbeans Eclipse Gitx Unity iTerm Mail Preferences Minecraft Virtualbox Dogecoin-Qt Gimp iBooks HipChat MCEdit Avira Thunderbird iExplorer Audacity items above featuring strikethroughs are those which I essentially never use.

item.title: uploaded apps
item.description: ##13:42 Monday 16 March 2015 JST## Met Mai and Tariq to upload six (6) new apps to Apple. They’ve been a while in the making, so glad to finally get them posted. One app binary passed the first round of tests but then came back as an invalid binary (and no other helpful information), so I’ll upload that again and hope for the best.

item.title: 18000 cool jokes funny typo
item.description: ##09:17 Sunday 27 January 2013 Browsing through free apps, I found 18000 cool jokes. Its meta-data includes ——————————————— EXAMPLE JOKE FROM THE APP ——————————————— "If there are any idiots in the room, will they please stand up?" said the sarcastic teacher. After a long silence, one freshman rose to his feet. "Now then mister, why do you consider yourself an idiot?" enquired the teacher with a sneer "Well, actually I don't.
